alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 18 at 2:36AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the second High Wind Warning, northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. For the second High Wind Warning, from 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive through Guadalupe Pass.
